PolicyPage.Name: What Not to Bring
PolicyPage.Title: Is there anything I shouldn't bring?
PolicyPage.Abstract: Note: this is not a comprehensive list of prohibitions.
PolicyPage.BodyCopy:
Examples of inappropriate items included (but are not limited to): pets, fireworks or other explosive/flammable materials, hot plates, space heaters, incense, candles, weapons (including firearms, BB guns, airsoft guns, paint/pellet guns, wrist rockets, large knives, and ammunition) should not be brought.


Some musical instruments/loud amplification devices may not be appropriate to use in the apartment. Safety and peaceful enjoyment of living areas for all residents should always be considered.

 

     "And finally, I cannot tell you all the things whereby ye may commit sin; for there are divers ways and means, even so many that I cannot number them.

 

      "But this much I can tell you, that if ye do not watch yourselves, and your thoughts, and your words, and your deeds, and observe the commandments of God, and continue in the faith of what ye have heard concerning the coming of our Lord, even unto the end of your lives, ye must perish. And now, O man, remember, and perish not" (Mosiah 4:29-30).
